title: What Kind of Adventurer Are You?

questions.question: What is your ideal way to spend a day off?

options.name: Exploring nature and going on a hike
Relaxing at home with a good book or movie
Trying out a new restaurant or cafe
Engaging in a competitive sport or physical activity

questions.question: Choose a fictional world to visit:
What's your preferred mode of transportation?
What's your approach to solving problems?

options.name: Analyzing the situation and making a strategic plan
Consulting with friends or seeking advice
Going with the flow and adapting as needed

questions.question: What's your favorite type of weather?

results.B: You're a Bookworm Dreamer! Your adventures often take place in the realms of imagination and fiction.
results.C: You're a Urban Wanderer! The city is your playground, and you find excitement in exploring its diverse offerings.
results.D: You're a Thrill-Seeker! Whether it's through sports or other physical activities, you crave the adrenaline rush of excitement..
